extendedInfo.description: The Nation's politics news articles and video articles in one application.The most reliable news sources you can get:- NBC News- The Washington Post- Reuters- CNN- Fox News- ABC News- The Huffington Post- Yahoo! News- CBS News- U.S. News- And many more...*WHAT IS IT?Riversip is the only news reader that guarantees you'll be up-to-date in less than 5 minutes by focusing on the major items - the items that are most important.*WHY WE DO IT?We want to help our users with the information overload of news.*HOW WE DO IT?The Riversip apps were designed to help you to to get the most important news articles in 1 minute, on 1 interface, instead of browsing through 5-6 different apps and 100+ headlines.*SO, what exactly do you get in Riversip?+ Real Plug & Play - No setup or learning time required. Fire Riversip for the first time â and immediately see what are the current âmust-knowâ news.+ Catch up on your own schedule - You can choose your own time-frame in one tap, so you'll be up-to-date no matter how often you're checking things out.+ Check out only the headlines â or go deeper - You can check out any news item's coverage from the many sources which covered it. Seeing how different publications cover the same event from different angles was never so easy !+ Social Networks - See what your friends from the social networks had to say about any given story.+ Your topics - You can pick your favorite topics (like: Senate/ Supreme Court) and create your own news feed.+ Push notifications for Important events.It's all in one easy to navigate and very informative interface.Follow and chat with us at: http://twitter.com/riversipUse of the Riversip Application is governed by the Riversip Terms of Use (http://www.riversip.com/terms).
